00024 matrix_ecL_as::matrix_ecL_as (const int N)
00025 {
00026     ecL = new double[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3*N + MATRIX_SIZE_3x3*(N-1)]();
00027 
00028     iQAT = new double[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00029 }

00032 matrix_ecL_as::~matrix_ecL_as()
00033 {
00034     if (ecL != NULL)
00035         delete ecL;
00036

00052 void matrix_ecL_as::chol_dec (double *mx9)
00053 {
00054     // 1st line
00055     mx9[0] = sqrt (mx9[0]);
00056 
00057     // 2nd line
00058     mx9[1] /= mx9[0];
00059     mx9[4] = sqrt(mx9[4] - mx9[1]*mx9[1]); 
00060 
00061     // 3rd line
00062     mx9[2] /= mx9[0]; 
00063     mx9[5] = (mx9[5] - mx9[2]*mx9[1])/mx9[4];
00064     mx9[8] = sqrt(mx9[8] - mx9[5]*mx9[5] - mx9[2]*mx9[2]);
00065 
00066     // These elements must be 0. (but they are never used)
00067 //    mx9[3] = mx9[6] = mx9[7] = 0;
00068 }

00071 
00083 void matrix_ecL_as::form_iQBiPB (const double *B, const double *i2Q, const double i2P, double* result)
00084 {
00085     // diagonal elements
00086     result[0] = i2P * B[0]*B[0] + i2Q[0];
00087     result[4] = i2P * B[1]*B[1] + i2Q[1];
00088     result[8] = i2P * B[2]*B[2] + i2Q[2];
00089 
00090     // symmetric elements (no need to initialize all of them)
00091     result[1] = /*result[3] =*/ i2P * B[0]*B[1];
00092     result[2] = /*result[6] =*/ i2P * B[0]*B[2];
00093     result[5] = /*result[7] =*/ i2P * B[1]*B[2];
00094 }

00097 
00106 void matrix_ecL_as::form_iQAT (const double A3, const double A6, const double *i2Q)
00107 {
00108     iQAT[0] = i2Q[0];
00109     iQAT[1] = A3 * i2Q[1];
00110     iQAT[2] = A6 * i2Q[2];
00111     iQAT[4] = i2Q[1];
00112     iQAT[5] = A3 * i2Q[2];
00113     iQAT[8] = i2Q[2];
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00127 void matrix_ecL_as::form_AiQATiQBiPB (const problem_parameters *ppar, const state_parameters stp, double *result)
00128 {
00129     form_iQBiPB (stp.B, ppar->i2Q, ppar->i2P, result);
00130 
00131     // 1st column
00132     result[0] += iQAT[0] + stp.A3*iQAT[1] + stp.A6*iQAT[2];
00133     result[1] +=                  iQAT[1] + stp.A3*iQAT[2];
00134     result[2] +=                                   iQAT[2];
00135 
00136     // 2nd column
00137     // symmetric elements are not initialized
00138 //    result[3] = iQBiPB[3] + A3*iQAT[4] + A6*iQAT[5];
00139     result[4] += iQAT[4] + stp.A3*iQAT[5];
00140     result[5] +=                  iQAT[5];
00141 
00142     // 3rd column
00143 //    result[6] = iQBiPB[6] + A6*iQAT[8];
00144 //    result[7] = iQBiPB[7] + A3*iQAT[8];
00145     result[8] += iQAT[8];
00146 }

00149 
00157 void matrix_ecL_as::form_L_non_diag(const double *ecLp, double *ecLc)
00158 {
00159     /* L(k+1,k) * L(k,k)' = - inv(Q) * A'
00160      *
00161      * xxx      xxx     xxx
00162      *  xx  *    xx =    xx
00163      *   x        x       x
00164      *
00165      * all matrices are upper triangular
00166      */
00167 
00168     // main diagonal
00169     ecLc[0] = -iQAT[0] / ecLp[0];
00170     ecLc[4] = -iQAT[4] / ecLp[4];
00171     ecLc[8] = -iQAT[8] / ecLp[8];
00172 
00173     // sub-diagonal 1
00174     ecLc[3] = (-iQAT[1] - ecLc[0]*ecLp[1]) / ecLp[4];
00175     ecLc[7] = (-iQAT[5] - ecLc[4]*ecLp[5]) / ecLp[8];
00176 
00177     // sub-diagonal 2
00178     ecLc[6] = (-iQAT[2] - ecLc[0]*ecLp[2] - ecLc[3]*ecLp[5]) / ecLp[8];
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 
00193 void matrix_ecL_as::form_L_diag(const double *ecLp, double *ecLc)
00194 {
00195     // L(k+1,k+1) = (- L(k+1,k) * L(k+1,k)') + (A * inv(Q) * A' + inv(Q) + B * inv(P) * B)
00196     // diagonal elements
00197     ecLc[0] -= ecLp[0]*ecLp[0] + ecLp[3]*ecLp[3] + ecLp[6]*ecLp[6];
00198     ecLc[4] -= ecLp[4]*ecLp[4] + ecLp[7]*ecLp[7];
00199     ecLc[8] -= ecLp[8]*ecLp[8];
00200     // symmetric nondiagonal elements (no need to initialize all of them)
00201     ecLc[1] -= /*ecLc[3] =*/ ecLp[3]*ecLp[4] + ecLp[6]*ecLp[7];
00202     ecLc[2] -= /*ecLc[6] =*/ ecLp[6]*ecLp[8];
00203     ecLc[5] -= /*ecLc[7] =*/ ecLp[7]*ecLp[8];
00204 
00205     // chol (L(k+1,k+1))
00206     chol_dec (ecLc);
00207 }

00210 
00216 void matrix_ecL_as::form (const problem_parameters* ppar)
00217 {
00218     int i;
00219     state_parameters stp;
00220 
00221 
00222 
00223     // the first matrix on diagonal
00224     stp = ppar->spar[0];
00225     form_iQBiPB (stp.B, ppar->i2Q, ppar->i2P, ecL);
00226     chol_dec (ecL);
00227 
00228 
00229     // offsets
00230     double *ecL_cur = &ecL[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00231     double *ecL_prev = ecL;
00232     for (i = 1; i < ppar->N; i++)
00233     {
00234         stp = ppar->spar[i];
00235         form_iQAT (stp.A3, stp.A6, ppar->i2Q);
00236 
00237         // form (b), (d), (f) ... 
00238         form_L_non_diag(ecL_prev, ecL_cur);
00239         // update offsets
00240         ecL_cur = &ecL_cur[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00241         ecL_prev = &ecL_prev[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00242 
00243         // form (c), (e), (g) ...
00244         form_AiQATiQBiPB (ppar, stp, ecL_cur);
00245         form_L_diag(ecL_prev, ecL_cur);
00246         // update offsets
00247         ecL_cur = &ecL_cur[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00248         ecL_prev = &ecL_prev[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00249     }
00250 }

00252 
00260 void matrix_ecL_as::solve_forward(const int N, double *x)
00261 {
00262     int i;
00263     double *xc = x; // 6 current elements of x
00264     double *xp; // 6 elements of x computed on the previous iteration
00265     double *cur_ecL = &ecL[0];  // lower triangular matrix lying on the 
00266                                 // diagonal of L
00267     double *prev_ecL;   // upper triangular matrix lying to the left from
00268                         // cur_ecL at the same level of L
00269 
00270 
00271     // compute the first 6 elements using forward substitution
00272     xc[0] /= cur_ecL[0];
00273     xc[3] /= cur_ecL[0];
00274 
00275     xc[1] -= xc[0] * cur_ecL[1];
00276     xc[1] /= cur_ecL[4];
00277 
00278     xc[4] -= xc[3] * cur_ecL[1];
00279     xc[4] /= cur_ecL[4];
00280 
00281     xc[2] -= xc[0] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[1] * cur_ecL[5];
00282     xc[2] /= cur_ecL[8];
00283 
00284     xc[5] -= xc[3] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[4] * cur_ecL[5];
00285     xc[5] /= cur_ecL[8];
00286 
00287 
00288     for (i = 1; i < N; i++)
00289     {
00290         // switch to the next level of L / next 6 elements
00291         xp = xc;
00292         xc = &xc[SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR];
00293 
00294         prev_ecL = &cur_ecL[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00295         cur_ecL = &cur_ecL[2 * MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00296 
00297 
00298         // update the right part of the equation and compute elements
00299         xc[0] -= xp[0] * prev_ecL[0] + xp[1] * prev_ecL[3] + xp[2] * prev_ecL[6];
00300         xc[0] /= cur_ecL[0];
00301 
00302         xc[3] -= xp[3] * prev_ecL[0] + xp[4] * prev_ecL[3] + xp[5] * prev_ecL[6];
00303         xc[3] /= cur_ecL[0];
00304 
00305 
00306         xc[1] -= xp[1] * prev_ecL[4] + xp[2] * prev_ecL[7] + xc[0] * cur_ecL[1];
00307         xc[1] /= cur_ecL[4];
00308 
00309         xc[4] -= xp[4] * prev_ecL[4] + xp[5] * prev_ecL[7] + xc[3] * cur_ecL[1];
00310         xc[4] /= cur_ecL[4];
00311 
00312 
00313         xc[2] -= xp[2] * prev_ecL[8] + xc[0] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[1] * cur_ecL[5];
00314         xc[2] /= cur_ecL[8];
00315 
00316         xc[5] -= xp[5] * prev_ecL[8] + xc[3] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[4] * cur_ecL[5];
00317         xc[5] /= cur_ecL[8];
00318     }
00319 }

00321 
00328 void matrix_ecL_as::solve_backward (const int N, double *x)
00329 {
00330     int i;
00331     double *xc = & x[(N-1)*SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR]; // current 6 elements of result
00332     double *xp; // 6 elements computed on the previous iteration
00333     
00334     // elements of these matrices accessed as if they were transposed
00335     // lower triangular matrix lying on the diagonal of L
00336     double *cur_ecL = &ecL[2 * (N - 1) * MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00337     // upper triangular matrix lying to the right from cur_ecL at the same level of L'
00338     double *prev_ecL; 
00339 
00340 
00341     // compute the last 6 elements using backward substitution
00342     xc[2] /= cur_ecL[8];
00343     xc[5] /= cur_ecL[8];
00344 
00345     xc[1] -= xc[2] * cur_ecL[5];
00346     xc[1] /= cur_ecL[4];
00347     xc[4] -= xc[5] * cur_ecL[5];
00348     xc[4] /= cur_ecL[4];
00349 
00350     xc[0] -= xc[2] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[1] * cur_ecL[1];
00351     xc[0] /= cur_ecL[0];
00352     xc[3] -= xc[5] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[4] * cur_ecL[1];
00353     xc[3] /= cur_ecL[0];
00354 
00355 
00356     for (i = N-2; i >= 0 ; i--)
00357     {
00358         xp = xc;
00359         xc = & x[i*SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR];
00360 
00361         cur_ecL = &ecL[2 * i * MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00362         prev_ecL = &cur_ecL[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00363 
00364 
00365         // update the right part of the equation and compute elements
00366         xc[2] -= xp[0] * prev_ecL[6] + xp[1] * prev_ecL[7] + xp[2] * prev_ecL[8];
00367         xc[2] /= cur_ecL[8];
00368 
00369         xc[5] -= xp[3] * prev_ecL[6] + xp[4] * prev_ecL[7] + xp[5] * prev_ecL[8];
00370         xc[5] /= cur_ecL[8];
00371 
00372 
00373         xc[1] -= xp[0] * prev_ecL[3] + xp[1] * prev_ecL[4] + xc[2] * cur_ecL[5];
00374         xc[1] /= cur_ecL[4];
00375 
00376         xc[4] -= xp[3] * prev_ecL[3] + xp[4] * prev_ecL[4] + xc[5] * cur_ecL[5];
00377         xc[4] /= cur_ecL[4];
00378 
00379 
00380         xc[0] -= xp[0] * prev_ecL[0] + xc[2] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[1] * cur_ecL[1];
00381         xc[0] /= cur_ecL[0];
00382 
00383         xc[3] -= xp[3] * prev_ecL[0] + xc[5] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[4] * cur_ecL[1];
00384         xc[3] /= cur_ecL[0];
00385     }
00386 }
